title: [Large-scale] Competency-based instructor training program design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and basic science knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended program for training pre-service science instructors, aiming for a balanced structure of theoretical learning and practical activities

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more science lesson plans according to competency-based instructional design principles.
Learners can apply at least two customized teaching strategies based on diagnostic learner assessments.
Learners can design and demonstrate at least one interactive class operation scenario using digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
